title: Miami knocks off Ohio St., marches on in CFP
content: Keionte Scott returned an interception 72 yards for a touchdown, Carson Beck threw a scoring pass and No. 10 Miami shocked defending champion Ohio State 24-14 on Wednesday night at the Cotton Bowl in the first College Football Playoff quarterfinal.

title: Day: Buckeyes' disastrous start in loss falls on me
content: Ohio State found itself in an early 14-0 hole in Wednesday's CFP quarterfinal game against Miami, a disastrous start the Buckeyes couldn't recover from in a 34-24 loss.

title: Wemby hyperextends knee, 'confident' he's OK
content: Spurs star Victor Wembanyama left Wednesday night's win over the Knicks with a hyperextension of his left knee but said he believes he'll be "all right" and expects to play in the next game.

title: Manning's 60-yard TD run seals Horns' Citrus win
content: Texas quarterback Arch Manning wrapped up Citrus Bowl MVP honors with a 60-yard scoring run in a 41-27 victory over No. 14 Michigan.

title: Edwards leaves bench after Wolves pull starters
content: Anthony Edwards made an unplanned and unapproved exit Wednesday, leaving the court and the bench during a timeout late in Minnesota's loss at Atlanta.

title: Packers claim CB Diggs to help ailing secondary
content: The Packers on Wednesday claimed veteran cornerback Trevon Diggs, a day after he was waived by the Cowboys.

title: Steelers' Rodgers to ponder 'options,' retirement
content: Steelers QB Aaron Rodgers, 42, said he hasn't "thought about" a return to Pittsburgh next season, as he has been focused on the Week 18 showdown against the Baltimore Ravens. But he acknowledges that he'll need to make a decision when the season ends.

title: Burrow on drought: 'Something's got to change'
content: With the Bengals again missing the playoffs, quarterback Joe Burrow said "something's got to change" heading into next season.

content: NIkola Jokic's knee injury puts him in jeopardy of missing too many games to qualify for the NBA MVP award.

content: From The Block to poster dunks, here's a look back at the 23 photos that define James' 23-year NBA career.

content: From top targets to top backups, we've tiered QBs ahead of the transfer portal officially opening Jan. 2.

content: The Indiana Fever guard discussed the process of creating her signature shoe, which will debut this spring, among other topics.

content: The January transfer window opens soon, and top clubs like Liverpool have big and expensive decisions to make.

content: The race to be crowned top scorer for club and country in 2025 is over, and some big names were in contention for the plaudits once again.

title: Our favorite MLB games of 2025: World Series Game 7, four-homer performances and much more
content: From playoff thrillers to epic individual achievements, these are the moments we'll remember for decades to come.

content: With the calendar set to turn to 2026, ESPN looks back at the 2025 F1 season to assign letter grades to all 21 drivers in the world championship.

title: Updated NFL Power Rankings: New 1-32 poll, plus what we learned about each team this season
content: Let's update our NFL Power Rankings one more time ahead of Week 18. We also picked out lessons for all 32 teams in 2025.

content: An all-encompassing look at the matchups to exploit or avoid and lineup locks in fantasy, as well as projected scores for all NFL games.

content: Identifying players to spend up for, teams to stack, value picks to grab and players you need to avoid.

content: Which lines offered value once odds came out? Here are games we are eyeing for bets going into Week 18.

title: Several Killed As Blast Rips Through Bar In Luxury Swiss Ski Resort Town
content: Several people were killed and many others injured in a massive explosion at a luxury ski resort town in Switzerland's Crans Montana.

title: UAE Targets 5 World Records With New Years Eve Fireworks, Drone Shows
content: The UAE welcomed the New Year with fireworks and drone displays across several emirates, as organisers aimed to break five world records on New Years Eve.

title: Centre's Fiscal Deficit Crosses 62% Of Full-Year Budget Target In November
content: The Centre's fiscal deficit at the end of November stood at Rs 9.76 lakh crore, or 62.3 per cent of the annual budget target for 2025-26, compared to 52.5 per cent in the year-ago period, according to government data released on Wednesday.

title: Watch: Times Square Ball Drop Rings In 2026 In New York City
content: The world welcomed 2026 at 12 am on January 1. Crowds rang in the New Year with exuberant celebrations filled with thunderous fireworks or light shows.

title: Lal Chowk To Pahalgam: Kashmir Rings In 2026 Amid Freezing Cold
content: From jam-packed Lal Chowk to the meadows of Pahalgam, Kashmir Valley rings in 2026 with celebrations.As traditional music and dance enthralled large crowds, it was an unmatched enthusiasm amid freezing cold.

title: Congress Likens Rahul Gandhi To Lord Ram, BJP's "Sycophancy Pro Max" Jab
content: Nana Patole, while responding to a question about Gandhi not visiting the newly constructed Ram Temple in Ayodhya so far, said that the senior Congress leader is "doing the work of Lord Ram".

title: "Traitor": BJP Leader Slams Shah Rukh Khan As KKR Buys Bangladeshi Player
content: Sangeet Som, a former member of the Uttar Pradesh Legislative Assembly, called Shah Rukh Khan a "traitor" for buying Bangladesh's fast bowler Mustafizur Rahman in the IPL.

title: Doctor Among 7 Arrested For Supplying Drugs To Students In Kerala
content: A doctor and a student of Bachelor of Dental Surgery (BDS) were among seven people arrested in a major drug bust in Kerala's Thiruvananthapuram.

title: US Embassy's "Significant Criminal Penalties" Warning For Illegal Immigrants
content: As US President Donald Trump prepares for a more aggressive immigration crackdown in 2026, the United States Embassy in India has warned migrants that breaking the country's law will be punished with "significant criminal penalties".

title: Indian-Origin Zohran Mamdani Takes Oath As New York's First Muslim Mayor
content: Zohran Mamdani has taken the oath as the new mayor of New York City at a historic ceremony at a decommissioned subway station in Manhattan.

title: Air India Pilot Detained In Vancouver Over Alcohol Smell, Flight Delayed
content: Air India, however, in its statement, said that the pilot was detained after the Canadian authorities raised concerns regarding his "fitness for duty".

title: On Camera, Elderly Woman Bitten, Hair Pulled By Monkeys In Haryana
content: An elderly woman was injured after being attacked by a group of monkeys in Haryanas Bahadurgarh, triggering concern over the presence of monkeys in residential areas.

title: Ensure Proper Treatment: Mohan Yadav To Doctors After Indore Water Tragedy
content: Madhya Pradesh Chief Minister Mohan Yadav visited Indore on Wednesday evening and met people hospitalised after falling ill due to consumption of contaminated drinking water, officials said.

title: Over 860 Drink-Driving Challans Issued On New Year's Eve In Delhi
content: The Delhi Traffic Police issued 868 challans for drink driving on New Year's Eve, an officer said on Thursday.

title: Will Mystery Of Malaysia Airlines Flight 370 Be Solved? Search Resumes
content: Despite years of multinational searches, investigators still do not know exactly what happened to Malaysia Airlines Flight 370 or its 239 passengers and crew.

title: India Surpasses Japan. When It May Overtake Germany As 3rd Largest Economy
content: India's GDP per capita was $2,694 in 2024, according to the latest World Bank figures, 12 times smaller than Japan's $32,487 and 20 times smaller than Germany's $56,103.

title: Madhya Pradesh Minister's "Useless" Reply To NDTV Question, Then A Public Apology
content: In Bhagirathpura, a densely populated locality of India's "cleanest city," at least 8 people have died after consuming contaminated tap water, according to families.

title: US Intelligence Rejects Russian Claim Of Ukraine Drone Plot Against Putin
content: US national security officials have concluded that Ukraine did not attempt to target Russian President Vladimir Putin or any of his residences in a reported drone operation.

title: Delhi Records 'Very Poor' Air Quality, Mumbai Sees Unusual Rain On New Year
content: Indias two biggest cities witnessed contrasting weather as 2026 began, with Delhi shrouded in smog and Mumbai recording early morning rainfall.

title: In A First For New York City, Zohran Mamdani To Take Oath As Mayor On Quran
content: Incoming Mayor Zohran Mamdani will take his midnight oath of office on a centuries-old Quran, marking the first time a mayor of New York City uses Islams holy text to be sworn in and underscoring a series of historic firsts for the city.

title: Several feared dead in an explosion at a luxury bar in Swiss ski resort town
content: An explosion of unknown origin ripped through a popular bar in the Swiss ski resort town of Crans-Montana early Thursday, killing and injuring several people. The blast occurred at Le Constellation during New Year celebrations, with emergency services still on the scene. The cause of the explosion remains undetermined as investigations continue.

title: Faridabad gangrape case: Woman‚Äôs cries unheard on foggy, isolated road ‚Äî chilling details emerge
content: A 25-year-old woman endured a harrowing ordeal, allegedly gang-raped for nearly three hours inside a moving van on a fog-shrouded Gurgaon-Faridabad Road. Her cries for help went unheard due to the dense fog and isolation. Police have arrested two van drivers, with further identification procedures pending. The victim sustained severe injuries and is recovering.

title: Indore water contamination deaths: Probe exposes major lapses; residents told to avoid tap water
content: Seven deaths have been reported in Indore's Bhagirathpura following a water contamination incident, with 162 patients hospitalized. A probe revealed a newly constructed toilet dumping waste directly above a loose joint in the main water supply pipeline, causing the contamination. Authorities are flushing the system and providing alternative water sources.

title: 'He is not knocking on the door': Ashwin's bold message to CSK on Sarfaraz ahead of IPL 2026
content: Sarfaraz Khan brought up his hundred in just 56 balls in what was a breathtaking knock. Ashwin also highlighted the batter‚Äôs performances in the recently concluded Syed Mushtaq Ali Trophy (SMAT), where he amassed 329 runs in seven matches at a strike rate of 203.08 and an average of 65.80.

title: Happy New Year 2026: Over 70 wishes to share ‚Äî images, quotes, status & more
content: As 2026 approaches, the article highlights the diverse ways people celebrate and express New Year's wishes. It emphasizes the value of simple, heartfelt messages, relatable quotes, and genuine status updates, alongside visual elements like images and wallpapers, to connect with loved ones during this transitional period.

title: Instagram failing fast: CEO says AI won; Makes 'raw' request to app's users'
content: Instagram's chief, Adam Mosseri, warns of AI's threat to authenticity, stating synthetic content will soon flood the platform. He admits Meta struggles to detect AI-generated images, suggesting camera manufacturers cryptographically sign real media instead. Mosseri also declared the era of polished feeds over, with raw, unproduced content now signaling genuine authenticity for users.

title: Indian-origin Mamdani sworn in as New York City first Muslim mayor at historic subway station ‚Äî watch
content: Indian-origin Zohran Mamdani was sworn in as New York City's first Muslim mayor early Thursday, beginning a four-year term. The 34-year-old Democrat took the oath at the City Hall subway station, with a larger public ceremony to follow. Mamdani, known for his left-leaning views, previously served in the New York State Assembly.

title: Ukraine drone plot against Putin: US intelligence rejects Russian claim ‚Äî What the CIA says
content: The CIA has refuted Russia's claim that Ukraine attempted to attack President Vladimir Putin's residence, a statement echoed by US officials. President Trump, initially troubled by the accusation, later acknowledged a lack of confirmation. This incident follows a meeting between Trump and Ukrainian President Zelenskyy, where progress on peace talks remained limited.

title: Ram‚Äôs ideals guided Operation Sindoor: Rajnath Singh
content: Defence Minister Rajnath Singh stated India acted with Lord Ram's ideals during Operation Sindoor, drawing inspiration from his virtues and role in vanquishing the wicked. He highlighted the Ram Janmabhoomi movement as a significant, centuries-long struggle that shaped society and laid foundations for the future.

title: Neuralink and parenting: Meta AI chief Alexandr Wang on kids; will wait until Neuralink advances
content: Meta's AI head, Alexandr Wang, revealed he will delay having children until advanced brain-computer interface (BCI) technology like Neuralink is widely available. Wang believes children's early neuroplasticity offers a prime window for intuitive BCI integration, potentially enabling future generations to learn and utilize superintelligence tools more effectively than adults.

title: Feb 1 GST hit: Cigarette, bidi, pan masala to attract 40% tax ‚Äî check details
content: Starting February 1, tobacco and pan masala products will face new taxes. The government is introducing additional excise duties and a health cess, replacing the existing GST compensation cess. Pan masala will be taxed at 40% GST plus a new cess, while biris will attract 18% GST.

title: Smriti shares cryptic Gita quote in year-end post after calling off wedding
content: As 2025 drew to a close, Smriti Mandhana took to Instagram on December 31 to share a recap video of the year gone by. The video featured glimpses of her World Cup-winning celebrations, cherished moments with her family, and snippets from her fitness routine. What stood out, however, was the quote she chose to end the video with‚Äîa line attributed to Lord Krishna from the Bhagavad Gita.

title: 'Impossible targets': Riders flag unsafe roads, shrinking earnings ‚Äî what triggered gig workers' protest
content: Delivery workers across India observed a New Year's Eve strike protesting low pay and lack of social security, despite app-based platforms offering festive bonuses. While many customers remained unaware, several orders faced significant delays. Platforms like Swiggy and Zepto increased per-order pay, but some workers refused the incentives, citing unachievable targets and the risk of ID blocking.

title: There will be no...: Meta buys AI startup Manus; Issues clarification on 'Chinese link'
content: Meta, the parent company of Facebook, has acquired Chinese-founded AI startup Manus for an estimated $2 billion to $3 billion. Manus, known for its autonomous AI agent, recently relocated its headquarters to Singapore. Meta emphasized that there will be no continuing Chinese ownership and operations in China will cease, aiming to navigate US-China tech tensions.

title: Mumbai receives surprise morning showers on 1st day of 2026
content: Mumbaikars welcomed the New Year 2026 with unexpected heavy showers and drizzle across several parts of the city on Thursday morning. The unseasonal rains, which began shortly before 6 am and gradually reduced, made the weather pleasant for many residents. Social media users shared their surprise and appreciation for the beautiful, albeit unusual, weather.

title: CBSE to train teachers for mandatory skill education from Jan 5: Check key details
content: CBSE will begin one-day, offline Capacity Building Programmes (CBPs) from January 5, 2026 to train teachers and school leaders for mandatory Skill Education in Classes 6‚Äì8, using NCERT‚Äôs Kaushal Bodh activity books. The move advances NEP 2020‚Äôs early skills vision. Here‚Äôs the schedule, key venues and what schools must implement‚Äîtimetable hours, projects, assessment and the year-end Kaushal Mela.

title: Stock market outlook 2026: Where are Sensex & Nifty headed? Top things to know
content: Indian equities lagged global markets in 2025 due to muted corporate earnings, FII selling, and missed AI rally. Despite touching record highs, broader market sentiment remained subdued. Experts anticipate a stronger 2026, driven by domestic growth, potential FII return, and improved valuations, with Nifty and Sensex targets set higher.

title: Who is Taylor McGregor? ESPN reporter earns praise during Hurricanes playoff game
content: Taylor McGregor received strong praise while covering the Miami Hurricanes‚Äô 10‚Äì3 playoff win over Texas A&M on Saturday. ESPN colleagues and fellow reporters applauded her work and presence on social media. McGregor continues to grow her profile at ESPN and MLB coverage, carrying forward a deep family connection to sports leadership.

title: Gold & silver price prediction: What's the outlook for New Year? Top things to know
content: Gold price prediction: According to Abhilash Koikkara of Nuvama Professional Clients Group, MCX Gold is expected to maintain its positive bias unless there is a clear and decisive break below the 132,000 support level.

title: Charity auction, Netanyahu among partygoers: Inside Trump and Melania‚Äôs Mar-a-Lago New Year‚Äôs Eve party
content: President Trump and First Lady Melania hosted their annual New Year's Eve party at Mar-a-Lago, with Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu among the high-profile guests. Trump's New Year's resolution was "Peace on Earth." The event included a charity auction where a painting sold for $2.75 million.

title: 'We can't indulge in idol worship': Actor Nushrratt Bharuccha's Mahakal visit sparks row
content: Bollywood actor Nushrratt Bharuccha's visit to Mahakaleshwar Temple and participation in Hindu rituals has drawn a fatwa from Maulana Mufti Shahabuddin Razvi Bareilvi. The religious leader stated her actions contravene Sharia, calling it a grave sin for a practicing Muslim. Bharuccha described her visit as "beautiful" and "deeply meaningful."

title: Anjel Chakma murder: Dehradun SSP open to adding racial-slur charge
content: Dehradun police are now open to new statements regarding alleged racial slurs in the Anjel Chakma murder case, after initially dismissing the angle. The victim's family claims attackers used derogatory terms, leading to the fatal assault. Police are investigating, focusing on identifying the last absconding accused. The victim's brother has requested privacy to grieve.

title: Water contamination kills 7: Crowned cleanest city 8 times, Indore now faces tap-water crisis
content: Contaminated drinking water has led to a severe outbreak of diarrhoea and vomiting in Indore's Bhagirathpura area, resulting in at least seven deaths and over 1,100 residents falling ill. Officials have acknowledged lapses, leading to the suspension of several municipal corporation employees. The incident has raised serious questions about civic oversight despite the city's 'cleanest city' reputation.

title: 'Dreams don't come true that quickly': Sarfaraz Khan after blistering 157 off 75 balls
content: Batting at No. 4, Sarfaraz Khan blasted nine fours and 14 sixes, bringing up his hundred off just 56 balls. His innings left Goa‚Äôs bowlers and fielders looking shellshocked. On Wednesday, he delivered it with a sledgehammer, scoring a blistering 157 off 75 balls to power Mumbai to a 87-run victory over Goa at the Jaipuria Vidyalaya Ground.

title: Two friends killed: Ex-boxing champion Anthony Joshua survives fatal car crash - Watch
content: Joshua was tr‚Äãavelling on Monday with Sina Ghami and Latif Ayodele on a busy highway linking Lagos and Ibadan in southwestern Nigeria when their SUV crashed into a stationary truck. The Traffic Compliance and Enforcement Agency (TRACE) in Ogun state, where the accident occurred, said preliminary investigations showed the vehicle suffered a tyre burst before ramming into the truck.

title: Rupee enters New Year 2026 in red: Falls 11 paise to 89.99 against US dollar
content: The Indian Rupee began 2026 on a weak footing, depreciating significantly against the US dollar due to sustained foreign fund outflows and trade uncertainties. Despite India's steady growth, capital flows have faltered, making the rupee vulnerable. Analysts anticipate continued volatility, with the currency facing pressure from global investor caution and tariff disruptions.

title: Bank holidays in 2026: When will banks remain closed in January? Check list
content: Banks across India will observe several closures in January 2026 due to national and regional holidays. Several states will see bank branches shut on dates ranging from January 2nd to January 26th, with Republic Day impacting most of the country. Customers are advised to plan physical transactions in advance, as digital services remain accessible.

title: 'New normal': India's 2025 'zero-tolerance' doctrine pushed terror outfits & Pak to sidelines
content: India's national security adopted a harder stance in 2025 following the brutal Pahalgam massacre. Prime Minister Modi declared a 'Yuddha' against terror, leading to Operation Sindoor, a significant counteroffensive targeting terror infrastructure deep inside Pakistan and PoK. Diplomatic and military actions were taken to hold Pakistan accountable for cross-border terrorism.

title: India vs New Zealand ODI squad announcement: Date, where to watch - All you need to know
content: India and New Zealand are set for an eight-match limited-overs series, including three ODIs and five T20Is, from January 11 to 31. This series is crucial for senior players returning to the ODI setup and for finalising T20 combinations ahead of the 2026 T20 World Cup. While the BCCI has already announced the T20I squad for the New Zealand series, the ODI squad is yet to be named.

title: Stock market today: Nifty50 opens above 26,150; BSE Sensex up over 100 points
content: Stock market today: Nifty50 and BSE Sensex, the Indian equity benchmark indices, opened in green on the first trading session of the New Year 2026. While Nifty50 went above 26,150, BSE Sensex was up over 100 points.

title: India vs New Zealand | Fit and firing: Why Agarkar & Co. can't ignore Shami anymore
content: Ajit Agarkar has been repeatedly questioned about the omission and has maintained the "need to play some cricket" stand. If 145.2 overs in Ranji Trophy, 26.5 overs in Syed Mushtaq Ali Trophy and 34.2 overs in ongoing Vijay Hazare Trophy doesn't qualify, then the definition of "some cricket" needs to be made clear.

title: New Year 2026: PM Modi greets nation, prays for 'peace and happiness in society'
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi and President Droupadi Murmu conveyed New Year wishes for 2026. They prayed for peace, good health, and happiness across society. The nation welcomed the year with vibrant celebrations. Fireworks lit up cities as people gathered to mark the fresh beginnings of 2026 with enthusiasm and cheer.

title: 'I'm in Dubai,' says Hadi killing suspect Dhaka accused India of sheltering
content: A key suspect in the murder of Bangladeshi Islamist radical Sharif Osman Hadi has denied involvement and refuted claims he fled to India. Faisal Karim Masud, identified as a primary suspect by Bangladesh, stated in a video message from Dubai that he is not involved in the killing and was forced to leave Bangladesh due to false implications.

title: New Year, same air: Delhi starts 2026 with ‚Äòvery poor‚Äô AQI at 372; Anand Vihar worst hit
content: Delhi woke to dense fog and 'very poor' air quality with AQI at 372, impacting visibility and traffic. Unfavorable meteorological conditions are expected to keep pollution levels high for the next six days. Despite a slight annual PM2.5 decline, the polluted season saw a rise, with Delhi remaining the most polluted city in the NCR.

title: SC handled 75k cases in 2025; unmatched by any top court
content: Chief Justice Surya Kant has introduced a new system to prioritize cases for the disadvantaged. Petitions from disabled individuals, acid attack survivors, senior citizens over 80, those below the poverty line, and legal aid recipients will now be fast-tracked. This initiative aims to ensure their cases don't get overlooked amidst the Supreme Court's massive caseload.

title: 'Want 22 of 28 seats from Kolkata, nearby areas': Amit Shah sets target for Bengal BJP
content: Union Home Minister Amit Shah urged BJP workers in Bengal to aim for victory in the 2026 assembly elections, setting a target of winning 22 out of 28 seats in and around Kolkata. He also expressed concerns about infiltration and a "changing demography" in the region, while dismissing perceptions of organizational weakness.

title: Zack & Dominique Wheeler‚Äôs 2025 net worth: Earnings, family & more
content: Zack Wheeler's net worth in 2025 is around 70 million dollars. This wealth stems mainly from his Major League Baseball contracts.  His wife, Dominique Wheeler, keeps her finances private.  Their combined net worth highlights how elite MLB deals shape family incomes in the modern era.  Wheeler's recent contract extension with the Phillies significantly boosted his financial standing.

title: Max Scherzer & Erica May-Scherzer‚Äôs 2025 net worth: Inside $180m empire
content: Max Scherzer, the formidable MLB pitcher, has amassed a $180 million net worth by 2025, a testament to his on-field dominance and shrewd financial planning. His career earnings are bolstered by strategic contracts and selective endorsements. Wife Erica May-Scherzer, a former player, significantly contributes to their philanthropic endeavors and family's financial stability.

title: Fans call Ayesha Curry‚Äôs gesture toward Stephen Curry an 'A+ wife move'
content: Ayesha Curry recently garnered widespread praise from fans for wearing her husband Stephen Curry's Davidson jersey during a visit to his alma mater. This heartwarming gesture, seen during a tribute to the NBA star, effectively silenced recent marriage rumors. Fans lauded her unwavering support and loyalty, highlighting the couple's strong bond.

title: Who is Aileen Lopera? Stefon Diggs‚Äô alleged baby mama amid Cardi B's silence
content: Stefon Diggs and Cardi B have been dragged into a new drama as the star player's new baby mama has alleged that she is pregnant with his child again. Aileen Lopera has sued Stefon Diggs for the second time as the star player is already involved in a messy legal trouble with his former private chef who has accused him of physical violence.

title: Joseph Parker & Andy Lee 2025 net worth: Earnings, investments & lifestyle
content: Joseph Parker and Andy Lee continue to attract fans and generate significant income beyond their boxing careers. Parker, a former WBO heavyweight champion, earns millions from fights and endorsements, while retired WBO middleweight champion Lee maintains his fortune through coaching and commentary. Their combined net worth is projected to be between $25-$37 million in 2025.

title: Bollywood actress issues clarification; breaks silence on ‚Äòrelationship‚Äô with Surya
content: Actress Khushi Mukherjee clarified her recent remarks about T20I captain Suryakumar Yadav, stating they were friends and no romantic relationship exists. She explained her comments were taken out of context and her Instagram was hacked. Mukherjee expressed support for Yadav and Team India ahead of the T20 World Cup, emphasizing no current contact.

title: Fresh relief: Cabinet freezes Vodafone Idea dues at Rs 87.7k crore
content: The Union cabinet has frozen Vodafone Idea's AGR dues at Rs 87,695 crore, with payments rescheduled over 10 years starting 2031-32. This decision, aimed at public interest and consumer welfare, offers the beleaguered telecom company a significant financial reprieve. Despite the relief, the company's shares saw a decline.

title: Contaminated Indore tap water leaves seven dead, 162 hospitalised
content: Contaminated tap water in Indore, India's cleanest city, has led to multiple deaths and dozens hospitalized due to diarrhoea and vomiting. A leakage mixing sewage with drinking water in Bhagirathpura is the suspected cause. Officials are investigating, with financial aid and free medical treatment announced for affected families.

title: 'Light of my life': Virat Kohli's new year post with Anushka Sharma breaks the internet
content: Virat Kohli celebrated the start of 2026 with a personal social media post alongside wife Anushka Sharma. On the cricketing front, the 35-year-old continues his remarkable ODI form, recently becoming the fastest to 16,000 List A runs after a stellar domestic return and a strong ODI series against South Africa.

title: Tobacco stocks tank in early trade; Godfrey Phillips down 10%
content: From February 1, pan masala, cigarettes, tobacco and similar products will attract a GST rate of 40%, while ‚Äòbeedi' will attract 18% Goods and Services Tax (GST), according to a government notification

title: Ancient Marathi literature reveals India‚Äôs savannas are not degraded forests
content: Centuries-old texts and oral traditions from western Maharashtra trace open, grassy landscapes back at least 750 years; experts¬†urge a biocultural conservation approach and caution against tree‚Äëplanting drives that misclassify grasslands as¬†wastelands¬†

title: Maharashtra civic polls: NCP in talks with Shiv Sena over seats in Pune, Pimpri-Chinchwad, says Ajit Pawar
content: Elections to 29 municipal corporations in Maharashtra, including Pune and Pimpri-Chinchwad civic bodies, will be held on January 15, 2026, and votes will be counted the next day

title: Plastic recycling unit gutted in major fire at Thamarassery in Kerala
content: Factory sources said no one sustained injuries in the incident. A pickup van was also destroyed in the blaze

title: Thane municipal corporation elections: Opposition alleges bias by officials over rejection of nomination papers
content: The Opposition leaders alleged that the returning officer showed bias in rejecting the nomination papers of Sena (UBT), MNS, VBA and independent candidates contesting from wards 16, 17 and 18

title: Over 2,730 motorists booked for drunk driving across Hyderabad on New Year‚Äôs Eve
content: Two fatal road accidents reported in the Cyberabad and erstwhile Rachakonda commissionerates, though police clarified that neither was directly linked to New Year revelry

title: National Sports Governance Act comes into effect partially
content: The provisions being brought into effect relate to the establishment and governance framework of National Sports Bodies, including the National Olympic Committee, National Paralympic Committee, National Sports Federations (NSFs) and Regional Sports Federation

title: Arms, large cache of explosives seized in Manipur's Kakching
content: Police said security forces are continuing search and area domination operations in fringe and vulnerable areas across districts

title: How did the Opposition fare in 2025?
content: INDIA bloc saw a gradual breakup electorally through the year as parties remain united only on its opposition to BJP

title: Passenger held with gold worth ‚Çπ3.89 crore at Mumbai airport
content: Directorate of Revenue Intelligence has claimed to have busted a gold smuggling syndicate after a passenger who arrived from Bahrain was intercepted

title: N. Vinay Hegde, Chancellor of Nitte (Deemed-to-be-University), passes away in Mangaluru
content: Mr. Hegde was the son of former Supreme Court judge late K.S. Hegde, and brother of former Karnataka Lokayukta N. Santosh Hegde.

title: Wanted Maoist killed in encounter with security forces in Bihar
content: The deceased has been identified as Dayanand Malakar, secretary of the north-Bihar Central Zonal Committee of the outlawed CPI-Maoist

title: Fire-hit Goa nightclub was built illegally on salt pan, operated without licence: Probe report
content: The probe report, made public on December 31, 2025, noted the ill-fated structure stood in the middle of a salt pan and was "not permissible under any law"

title: Goa nightclub fire: Arpora sarpanch disqualified, then panchayat secretary sacked from government service
content: Based on the findings of the magisterial inquiry report released earlier in the day, the Director of Panchayat termed Roshan Redkar's conduct as "persistent remiss of duties"

title: Farmer, son arrested for growing ganja saplings in Tirupattur
content: During the inquiry, Mr. Sankaran told the police that he had been growing the plants in his house for several months

title: Swamp soil yields evolution of Kaziranga‚Äôs vegetation
content: The study, published in a journal of soil science and geomorphology, also reveals how rhinos moved from the northern and western parts of the Indian subcontinent to the northeastern region

title: West Bengal gets its first female Chief Secretary as Nandini Chakravorty
content: Nandini¬†Chakravorty, who was in charge of State‚Äôs Home and Hill Affairs Department replaced Manoj Pant as the Chief Secretary who superannuated on December 31

title: Will protect Waqf properties in West Bengal, Mamata assures through newspaper advertisement
content: The half-page advertisements published in major national and vernacular dailies states that the West Bengal  Government continues to oppose the new Waqf Amendment Act

title: Secured over 92% conviction rate, cracked key terror cases in 2025: NIA
content: Major achievements include extradition of 2008 Mumbai terror attacks accused Tahawwur Rana from the U.S., and the arrest of several terrorists and their associates involved in the Pahalgam and Delhi attacks

title: India-UAE joint military exercise concludes in Abu Dhabi
content: The DESERT CYCLONE‚ÄìII exercise strengthened professional bonds between the two armies and contributed to the development of interoperable capabilities for future multinational operations

title: Left govt. distances itself from Bevco‚Äôs liquor-naming contest amid Church criticism
content: Excise Minister says the advertisement inviting the public to suggest a name and logo for the liquor brand was issued by Bevco and the govt. has no role in the decision

title: Stop serving lies to people and introspect, Nadda tells Kharge
content: Responding to the Congress‚Äôs allegations that the MGNREGA has been abolished, J.P. Nadda said the scheme was expanded by increasing working days to 125, ensuring payment within 15 days

title: Security heightened in Kashmir as tourist footfalls return
content: Pahalgam decks up for New Year celebrations, vehicles checked, facial recognition devices scan travellers, additional checkpoints set up in Gulmarg

title: DRDO conducts salvo launch of Pralay missiles off Odisha coast
content: The DRDO carried out a salvo launch of two indigenous Pralay missiles from the same launcher on December 31. The test was held off the coast of Odisha

title: Pharmacies in Tamil Nadu to display QR code for reporting adverse drug events
content: In 10 days, around 42,000 chemist shops in T.N. will display the QR code¬†as per the instructions of Central Drugs Standard Control Organisation

title: Centre pre-publishes draft Rules for four Labour Codes
content: The rules define workers, wages, types of employment, gratuity, bonus and social security of workers, including gig workers

title: On property registration and title | Explained
content: What did the Supreme Court rule in¬†Samiullah vs State of Bihar? Why did the court strike down Bihar‚Äôs mutation-linked registration rules? Why is registration legally distinct from title or ownership? What structural flaws make land transactions ‚Äòtraumatic‚Äô in India?

title: No third party mediation during Operation Sindoor: government officials refute intervention claims by China and U.S.
content: After U.S. President Trump had made several such claims, Chinese Foreign Minister Wang Yi recently said that Beijing had helped stop India-Pakistan conflict

title: Malayali priest, seven others get bail in conversion case
content: The priest was arrested following a complaint from members of VHP and the Bajrang Dal; the priest, his family and his associates had gone to Shingori to attend a prayer meet

title: Decade after GMR‚Äôs ouster, AAI to study Maldives plea to run airport
content: Following a request from the Maldives government, the Civil Aviation Ministry has asked AAI to study a proposal to engage Indian companies to manage the upgraded Hanimaadhoo airport

title: Telcos accuse Adani-run Navi Mumbai airport of blocking mobile infra, allege monopoly arrangements
content: The airport operator has deployed an in-building network and has sought from telcos ‚Äúextortionary charges‚Äù that ‚Äúundermine competition and consumer choice‚Äù

title: Indore water contamination: Official dismissed, two others suspended as death toll rises to 10; probe panel formed
content: The deceased include a six-month-old child who passed away on Wednesday and six women;¬†more than 100 people from Indore‚Äôs Bhagirathpura area have been admitted to hospitals in the past one week after drinking water from a municipal supply line

title: Centre bans oral formulations of nimesulide above 100mg
content: Nimesulide is a non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drug used for its¬†pain-relieving, anti-inflammatory, and fever-reducing effects

title: 26/11 hero Sadanand Date appointed as new DGP of Maharashtra; to take charge on January 3
content: Even today, Mr. Date carries metallic splinters from that night embedded in his body, especially one near his eye and he describes them as ‚Äúmedals‚Äù from a war zone rather than injuries.

title: 150 kg of explosives seized in Rajasthan on New Year‚Äôs eve
content: Investigative agencies were working to determine the purpose for which the consignment was intended to be used, including for blasting at illegal mining sites in the Aravalli hills

title: A year of changing views in the Supreme Court
content: The year 2025 saw Supreme Court ‚Äòclarify‚Äô, ‚Äòmodify‚Äô and ‚Äòrecall‚Äô its decisions in a variety of issues ranging from stray dogs to retrospective environmental clearances to pollution norms in response to either public furore or on the urging of authorities

title: Andhra Pradesh disburses over ‚Çπ2,700 crore in NTR Bharosa pensions ahead of the New Year
content: Chief Minister Chandrababu Naidu says the decision to release pensions in advance is intended to bring cheer to poor households during the New Year

title: Kerala minister, Thiruvananthapuram mayor spar over use of Smart City e-buses
content: V.V. Rajesh accuses KSRTC of contractual violation, to which Minister K.B. Ganesh Kumar replies with State‚Äôs a 60% stake in Smart City funding, which as per him the Corporation could ill afford to ignore

title: MMU objects to ‚ÄòVande Mataram‚Äô singing competition in J&K
content: The religious body Muttahida Majlis-e-Ulema cites faith concerns; seeks sensitivity in official outreach on the issue

title: Samiti terms MLAs‚Äô protest a farce, says they are not  interested in resolving traffic issues on Ghat road
content: They have neither made practical suggestions to resolve traffic congestion on the Thamarasseri ghat road nor forced the government to face the real reason for the congestion

title: ‚ÄòVote chori‚Äô is taking place via electoral rolls and not EVMs, Trinamool delegation says
content: The delegation highlights ‚Äòlogical discrepancies‚Äô affecting approximately 1.36 crore voters, including in unreasonable parent-child age gaps, grandparents‚Äô ages, name and surname mismatches, and address-related issues

title: ‚ÄòKuppadam‚Äô textiles from Chemancheri gets recognition in Republic Day event in Delhi
content: Two master weavers from the Chemancheri unit of Kozhikode Sarvodaya Sangham have been invited to attend the Republic Day programme

title: Quantum courses to LEAP model, schools in Andhra Pradesh see major policy push in 2025
content: Hosting of mega Parent-Teacher Meet, recruitment of teachers through DSC, implementation of teacher transfers and promotions, unified digital app for teachers, and adoption of NCERT-aligned bilingual curriculum are some of the other major initiatives taken during the year

title: NFL futures: Seattle Seahawks enter Week 18 as Super Bowl favorites
content: Through 17 weeks of the NFL season, the  Seattle Seahawks  are the new favorites to win the Super Bowl 60, following the  Los Angeles Rams 's loss on "Monday Night Football." The Rams drop to second, as three NFC West teams sit in the top four. The AFC West-winning  Denver Broncos  have the third-best odds to win the Super Bowl at +700. The  San Francisco 49ers  at +850 and the AFC East champion  New England Patriots  at +900. The Seahawks and 49ers meet in Week 18. Note: Odds by  DraftKings Sportsbook  and subject to change.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Jo√£o Cancelo back on Barcelona's radar
content: 'ESPN FC' team react to 2-0 win over villarreal in laLiga . RB Leipzig winger Yan Diomande is wanted by the red Devils . former barcelona loanee joo Cancelo is in the sights of the laliga champions, while he is currently on loan at the club .

title: Which NBA star had the best year? The 2025 Golden Basketball goes to ...
content: the Oklahoma City Thunder are 1-2 again in the first installment of the MVP straw poll conducted by ESPN's Tim Bontemps . Shai Gilgeous-Alexander and Nikola Jokic of the Denver Nuggets battled for MVP of the 2024-25 regular season .

title: NBA Power Rankings: Where all 30 teams stack up
content: the New York Knicks are sporting the no. 3 best offense in the league in December . but keep an eye on the race for the play-in as we approach the back half of the regular season . it's a close race at the top of the East with the Detroit Pistons holding strong at No. 1 .

title: No more Exit 30: Davidson renames historic exit after Stephen Curry
content: Stephen Curry is renamed Stephen Curry Interchange for his contributions to the school's men's basketball program . the star has worn the number 30 throughout his college and the pro career . he wore his Davidson sweatsuit along with a pair of "Carmine" Air Jordan Retro 6's .

title: 'Need this on my fridge': Bucs TEs' festive Christmas cards lost in mail
content: two Tampa Bay Buccaneers teammates posted a series of hilariously awkward holiday photos on Instagram . the two were seen wearing matching head-to-toe outfits and striking an assortment of cheesy poses in front of a Christmas tree . no players were injured attempting the stunt .

title: ACC preview: Final Four contenders, more March Madness predictions
content: the 18-team league received its lowest number of NCAA bids in more than a decade . it hasn't been a top-three conference since before 2020 . the ACC had eight top-40 teams in 2019 compared to last season's four .

title: Our 2025 All-Rookie Team: We picked standout first-years at every single position
content: all rookies make bad plays, and peak performances are weighed fairly heavily . this list is based on the bulk of positive plays . it's the right time to summarize some seasonlong performances . we turn our eyes to the race to super Bowl LX .

title: How speedster Zachariah Branch made a fast impression at Georgia
content: Zachariah Branch puts Georgia up 3 scores with a 13-yard receiving touchdown . the former USC receiver and his brother, Zion, entered the transfer portal in 2024 . "he made me aware of him," coach Kirby Smart said .

title: Takeaways: Miami's toughness, defense huge in upset of Ohio State
content: no. 10 Miami beats Ohio State 24-14 in the goodyear cotton bowl Classic . the next three quarterfinals will take place on friday . defending champions will be beaten on tuesday night .

title: NFL playoff schedule, projected bracket: Here's what to know in both conferences
content: the playoffs will begin Saturday, Jan. 10 with the first two wild-card round games . there are two open spots (one in each conference), uncertainty for both the AFC and NFC 1-seeds and a few division titles out there for the taking . we won't know the complete playoff bracket until late Sunday night .
